div.div: Early on Halloween morning, members of Facebook's Computer Emergency Response Team received an urgent e-mail from an FBI special agent who regularly briefs them on security matters. The e-mail contained a Facebook link to a PHP script that appeared to give anyone who knew its location unfettered access to the site's front-end system.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/X17bE8&via=Digg&text=Facebook's War Games

div.a: Here Is A Ridiculously Effective Slingshot Minigun

div.a: Why Republicans Are The Party Of White People

div.div: With Barack Obama sworn in for a second term—the first president in either party since Ronald Reagan to be elected twice with popular majorities—the GOP is in jeopardy, the gravest since 1964, of ceasing to be a national party.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Z3dkpg&via=Digg&text=Why Republicans Are The Party Of White People

div.a: Police To Use Drones In LAPD Cop Killer Manhunt

div.div: The search for Dorner is now the first official drone-hunt in US history.

div.div: WAR, WHAT IS IT GOOD FOR?

div.a: Apple And Samsung, Frenemies For Life

div.div: It was the late Steve Jobs' worst nightmare. A powerful Asian manufacturer, Samsung, uses Google's Android software to create smartphones and tablets that closely resemble the iPhone and the iPad.

div.div: The most-storied warrior tribe in Ecuador prepares to fight as the government sells gold-laden land to China.

div.a: Looking For Clues In The Secret Art Work Of George W. Bush

div.div: When hackers broke into former President George W. Bush’s email last week, they found photographs of unfinished self portraits of the former president in the shower and the bath tub.

div.a: How F*cked Is The Beautiful Game?

div.div: I am a midlevel Hungarian gangster. You are a Finnish referee. So here's how it works.

div.a: Apple Developing A Curved Glass Smartwatch

div.div: Dick Tracy had one. As did Inspector Gadget and James Bond. A watch that doubled as a computer, two-way radio, mapping device or television.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WPQxJl&via=Digg&text=Apple Developing A Curved Glass Smartwatch

div.a: William Shatner Calls Out Reddit For Racism And Hate Mongering

div.div: New redditor William Shatner has taken to the famously libertarian online community, calling it out for allowing racism and bigotry.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12DU7eG&via=Digg&text=William Shatner Calls Out Reddit For Racism And Hate Mongering

div.a: Is The Earth Cooking Up Another Super Volcano?

div.div: Every few million years or so, the Earth burps up a gargantuan volcano. These aren't like volcanoes in our lifetimes; these "super volcanoes" can erupt continuously for thousands of years. While they might be rare, you'd best look out when one hits.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12g45OX&via=Digg&text=Is The Earth Cooking Up Another Super Volcano?

div.div: The prototype of the drones now used in Afghanistan was actually conceived in 1916, even if it was a monoplane made of wood and tin.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/123hrT5&via=Digg&text=Is This The First Drone?

div.a: Welcome To The Retro-Futuristic World Of Laurent Durieux

div.div: Laurent Durieux doesn’t actually live in a retro-futuristic world imagined by H.G. Wells and designed by Raymond Loewy, but looking at his screenprints of the past few years, you’d be forgiven for thinking he does.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WWX4TZ&via=Digg&text=Welcome To The Retro-Futuristic World Of Laurent Durieux

div.a: Drug Users Turn Death Dealers As Methadone Hits The Streets

div.div: Liquid methadone, used for decades to help addicts abate withdrawal symptoms as they quit heroin or other opiates, is leaking into illegal street sales via take-home doses.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Wz4YTP&via=Digg&text=Drug Users Turn Death Dealers As Methadone Hits The Streets

div.a: The Double Agent Who Infiltrated Al Qaeda

div.div: Even Obama knew the name of the Danish double agent who never got his due for helping lead U.S. drones to Anwar al-Awlaki. Now he's telling his own story.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11SydV6&via=Digg&text=The Double Agent Who Infiltrated Al Qaeda

div.a: Photos Examine What Nature Would Look Like If It Were Truly Symmetrical

div.div: The concept behind the series, is the baffling issue of symmetry, and how symmetry does not exist in nature.
